channel.title: Engadget
channel.description: Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2021 Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved

item.title: Google-backed autonomous flight company Merlin will power a fleet of 55 aircraft
item.description: Google-backed Merlin Labs is partnering with Dynamic Aviation to retrofit 55 utility aircraft with its self-driving software.

item.title: Sonos' One SL speaker is now more power efficient
item.description: The new model of the non-microphone variant of the Sonos One features a more efficient wireless radio.

item.title: Epic's next-gen Unreal Engine 5 is now available in early access
item.description: Epic Games has made Unreal Engine 5 available in Early Access, giving developers a chance to build next-gen games for consoles and PCs.

item.title: Get 10 courses on Unity game development and a year of PlayStation Plus for $70
item.description: This bundle contains 97 hours of content that teaches the specifics of game design using Unity. As a bonus you'll also get a year of PlayStation Plus.

item.title: Robotic 'digger finger' could search for buried land mines
item.description: Researchers have built a robot 'finger' that can dig through sand to find buried items like land mines and cables.

item.title: Teardown shows the new Apple TV 4K is easy to repair, but Siri Remote is a pain
item.description: The new Apple TV 4K is a cinch to repair, but the Siri Remote is a huge pain.

item.title: 'Pokémon Legends: Arceus' is coming to Switch on January 28th
item.description: 'Pokémon Brilliant Diamond' and 'Shining Pearl' will drop on November 19th.

item.title: The Polestar 2 offers Volvo quality in a performance EV
item.description: Roberto Baldwin takes Polestar's $60,000 performance EV out for a spin. It impressed us with spirited driving, an eye-catching design and an Android Automotive infotainment system that won us over.

item.title: Instagram gives everyone the ability to hide likes
item.description: Instagram will allow all users to hide likes, though it’s keeping the feature optional and users will need to enable the feature in their settings.

item.title: Amazon is buying Hollywood studio MGM for $8.45 billion
item.description: Amazon is acquiring Hollywood studio MGM for $8.45 billion.

item.title: Microsoft says Edge is now the 'best performing' Windows 10 browser
item.description: The next release of Edge will be the "best-performing" browser available on Windows 10 when it arrives later this week, Microsoft claimed at its Build 2021 event.

item.title: Microsoft's first OpenAI-powered feature helps beginners build productivity apps
item.description: Microsoft has officially introduced its first GPT-3-powered feature in a customer product.

item.title: The Mod Dwarf promises an entire guitar store's worth of effects in a single pedal
item.description: The Mod platform has a lot of potential and a lot of rough edges.

item.title: European Commission may soon open an antitrust investigation into Facebook
item.description: The EU is readying a formal antitrust probe into Facebook's classified ads operation.

item.title: The Morning After: Microsoft is close to revealing the 'next generation' of Windows
item.description: Microsoft is starting to talk about what's next for Windows, and USB-C is getting a big power boost.

item.title: Facebook reveals how influence campaigns changed between the 2016 and 2020 elections
item.description: Facebook has published a new report on the state of influence operations on its platform. The report covers fake account takedowns between 2017 and 2020.

item.title: USB-C upgrade will more than double its power capacity to 240W
item.description: An update to USB-C standard could deliver 240W of power, more than double the connector's current capacity.

item.title: Amazon's Eero 6 routers now support Apple HomeKit
item.description: Amazon has rolled out a firmware update for its latest Eero mesh routers that adds support for Apple's HomeKit smart home platform.

item.title: US removes Xiaomi from blocklist of Chinese military companies
item.description: A US court has removed Android smartphone maker Xiaomi from a government blocklist of companies with ties to the Chinese military.

item.title: WhatsApp sues Indian government over law making private messages 'traceable'
item.description: WhatsApp has sued the Indian government over a new internet law that would force it to make users' message "traceable."

item.title: Google's first Street View EV is a Jaguar loaded with air quality sensors
item.description: Over the next twelve months, Jaguar I-Pace EVs outfitted with Google's Street View mapping technology will be driving around Dublin.

item.title: Sony is 'strengthening' PlayStation Now as it tries to reach 1 billion people
item.description: Sony's push to reach 1 billion people includes using PlayStation Now to boost PlayStation Plus.

item.title: Tesla starts phasing out radar sensors in favor of vision-only Autopilot
item.description: New Tesla Model 3 and Model Y vehicles will rely solely on cameras to feed info for driver assist systems like "Full Self Driving" and Autopilot.

item.title: Sling starts beta testing an updated app with Amazon Fire TV owners
item.description: Currently available to select individuals who access the streaming TV service through Amazon Fire TV devices, the highlight of the redesign is an updated personalization engine that powers a refreshed home screen.

item.title: Valve is reportedly prototyping a Nintendo Switch-like gaming PC
item.description: Evidence that Valve is working on a portable Switch-like device that will allow Steam users to play part of their game library on the go is starting to pile up.
